title: eppOdhu varuvaayO
sahitya:
eppOdu varuvAyO edirpArttu pArttu manam EngugirEn kavalai OnguginrEn sAmi



anupallavi



oppuyarvillAda uttama cidambaram oLirum naTarAjanE eLiyEn kuTilai

nADi



caraNam 1



kATrasaindAlum un kAlaDi shaddam enbEn kadiravanai neTrikkaNNEvA

enbEn

kUTrai udaitta unnai kUDi vAzha ninaindEn kuripparndennai nIyE

kuppidAk-kAttirundEn 



caraNam 2



tUdanuppi azhaikka tuNaivar evarum illEn duraiyE en

kAdalait-tuNindu veLiyir-shollEn

shOditta shOdanai pOdum en nAthanE tuyaraik-kAttiDa tUkkiya pAdanE
